title: Momentum of a third piece of 2D explosion

content.prompt: A stationary object explodes, breaking into three pieces of masses m, m, and 3m. The two pieces of mass m move off at right angles to each other with the same magnitude of momentum mV, as shown in the diagram above. What are the magni­tude and direction of the velocity of the piece having mass 3m ?
